Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server

Class SimpleAPILayerServer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.SimpleAPILayerServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SimpleAPILayerServer
extends java.lang.Thread
Class representing the external server part of the APILayer class. This class represents the ReflectionMethodInvocationServer instance for an APILayer instance, which contains the Methods which may be invoked externally.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleAPILayerServer

      public SimpleAPILayerServer​(int amountOfThreads, int port, @NotNull @NotNull StorageLayer storageLayer, @NotNull @NotNull java.util.Map<PublicEntityIdentifier,​PrivateEntityIdentifier> registeredUsers, @NotNull @NotNull java.util.Map<PublicEntityIdentifier,​java.util.Map<RTreePolicy,​RevocationSecret>> revocationSecretsAcceptedPolicies, @NotNull @NotNull java.util.Map<PublicEntityIdentifier,​StorageElementIdentifier> currentStorageElementIdentifiers, @NotNull @NotNull FileServerInterface fileServer) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor for the SimpleAPILayerServer class.
      Parameters:
      amountOfThreads - The amount of simultaneous requests the SimpleAPILayerServer can support.
      port - The port on which the SimpleAPILayerServer should run.
      storageLayer - The StorageLayer.
      registeredUsers - A Map, linking the PublicEntityIdentifiers of the registered users of the cloud storage service provider to their PrivateEntityIdentifier counterparts.
      revocationSecretsAcceptedPolicies - A Map, linking the PublicEntityIdentifiers of the registered users of the cloud storage service provider to another Map. The latter one maps the RTreePolicys of the accepted IssuerPartAttestations for that user to the included RevocationSecret (as a RevocationCommitment) of the same user.
      currentStorageElementIdentifiers - A Map, mapping the PublicEntityIdentifiers of the registered users of the cloud storage service provider to the StorageElementIdentifier for the next element in the personal queue of that user.
      fileServer - The FileServerInterface realization for this SimpleAPILayerServer.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If an IO-related exception occurred while booting the server.

  • Method Details

    • receiveIssuerPartAttestation

      @NotNull public @NotNull vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse receiveIssuerPartAttestation​(@NotNull @NotNull IssuerPartAttestation issuerPartAttestation, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String firstAESKey)
      Method to complete a received IssuerPartAttestation and store the result in the StorageLayer. This method however returns a ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse with an Exception if the authenticity of the first layer could not be verified, or if the PublicEntityIdentifier mentioned in the plaintext header of the provided IssuerPartAttestation can not be linked to a registered user of the cloud storage service provider.
      Parameters:
      issuerPartAttestation - The received IssuerPartAttestation instance.
      firstAESKey - The first ephemeral AES key of the IssuerPartAttestation instance to verify its authenticity with.
      Returns:
      A new ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse with the String "OK" if the operation succeeded, or with an Exception if the operation failed due to a previously mentioned problem.

    • receiveProofObject

      @NotNull public @NotNull vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse receiveProofObject​(@NotNull @NotNull ProofObject proofObject)
      Method to receive a valid ProofObject and convert it to a valid APILayerMacaroon.
      Parameters:
      proofObject - The ProofObject.
      Returns:
      A ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse containing the generated APILayerMacaroon if the provided ProofObject is valid, or a ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse containing an Exception if the provided ProofObject is invalid.

    • handleFileServerRequest

      @NotNull public @NotNull vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse handleFileServerRequest​(@NotNull @NotNull APILayerMacaroon macaroon, @NotNull @NotNull FileServerRequest fileServerRequest)
      Method to invoke a FileServerInterface method of the APILayer.
      Parameters:
      macaroon - A APILayerMacaroon, which proves that the user is allowed to invoke the specified FileServerInterface operation specified by the provided FileServerRequest instance.
      fileServerRequest - The FileServerRequest instance, specifying the method the user wants to invoke.
      Returns:
      A ReflectionMethodInvocationServerResponse instance which either contains the result of the operation, or which contains an Exception if the operation could not be executed due to an invalid APILayerMacaroon.

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      public java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
      Getter for the InetAddress of this server.
      Returns:
      The InetAddress of this server.
